synopsis.text:
Edo-period virtual reality simulation turns into a real-life nightmare for high school student Tokidoki Rikugou, as he finds himself trapped in a world filled with samurai, spirits, and mythical creatures. Initially visiting a high-tech museum to improve his history grades, Tokidoki is attacked by a nue, a monstrous being, and loses an eye. Stunned, he realizes that he's no longer wearing his VR goggles and is now stuck in this alternate reality.

With the help of Kuchiha, a warrior woman possessed by a dog spirit, and Shinonome, a fellow student who has been trapped for two years, Tokidoki must navigate this treacherous world. As he uncovers the truth behind the nue and the mysterious simulation, Tokidoki must find a way to return home while protecting the village from the supernatural forces that lurk within. Join Tokidoki on this thrilling and suspenseful journey that blurs the line between history and the virtual world.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
